conversation.message: I feel like we’re meant to be together. What if I came to visit you?
There’s just one thing. My ticket is more expensive than I thought. If you could help with the flight, I can cover the rest when I get there.
No problem, I’ll help with the ticket.
You have no idea how happy you’re making me! Just a bit more, and I’ll be there in your arms.
I’m so excited! Just let me know how much to send.
About $1,200 should cover it. I can’t wait to finally meet you, my love.
It’s going to be amazing. I’ll transfer the money now.
